website_summaries.verdict: This basket lets you lock and flip burgers, fish fillets, and chicken pieces with ease, thanks to its removable handle.
pros: Grid gaps provide even heat distribution
Lockable grate keeps burgers and fish fillets in place
Lets you flip food more easily than handle-less baskets
Comes in a variety of sizes
cons: Thicker pieces can prevent basket from locking and fall out when you flip

customer_reviews.title: You can prevent the clip from slipping off
customer_reviews.text: See earlier review. Video now attached showing how to modify the clip to prevent the two halves of the grill basket from inadvertently coming open.
customer_reviews.author: David Y.

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Great buy. Grilled an whole chicken using this basket. Easy to use, sturdy and clean afterwards. Be sure to grease the basket before use. Totally worth it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Malini Inderdeo

customer_reviews.title: Easier to flip food, especially stuff that can fall through a grate
customer_reviews.text: Should have bought this before. Now my veggies don't fall through.
customer_reviews.author: Kealoha

customer_reviews.title: Great for shrimp and veggies
customer_reviews.text: My husband used this product to grill some small shrimp. The holes are small so nothing falls through. Gives you the ability to grill things you normally wouldn't be able to. It's super sturdy and easy to clean. I just soaked it for a bit and used a regular sponge. I thought it would be way harder since it was black but just one scrub and it was shiny again. Nice rust resistant material and great quality. Highly recommend to anyone wanting to grill smaller things.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to clean and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I have used several Grilling Baskets over the years, and this one is by far the best. Previous baskets had springs that got tangled, or were not stainless steel and rusted. This one is easy to clean and easy to use. I use it mostly for large salmon fillets from Costco. I use two baskets as we often have friends and family for cookouts. To be able to shut the lid for the grill, and to fit in both grilling baskets, I often use a grilling glove to turn the baskets rather than the handles. My only minor complaint is that sometimes the edge of the basket catches when opening the basket.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Williams

customer_reviews.title: Like the wooden handle vs rubber
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a basket after my last one had the rubber handle melt while grilling (not sure why it would be rubber for a grill) but this one has a wood handle that in my first use was so much better and did not get hot. I always recommend oiling the grates very well before putting anything in it which reduces sticking. Grilled some swordfish steaks and this was able to hold them, and the clasp stayed closed during flipping which was my main concern.
customer_reviews.author: Brian G.

customer_reviews.title: It does what you think it does and a lot more.
customer_reviews.text: At first I started to return it back glad I didn’t. It appeared not to be large enough for the size burgers I like, is shopped around and found most portable grill appeared to be that size. It did the trick once I got the burgers complete, to me I thought those were among the best ones I have grilled outdoors.
customer_reviews.author: Agent 87

customer_reviews.title: Love this!!
customer_reviews.text: Best way to cook fish, scallops and shrimp on the grill. Duh, I should have thought of this years ago! I have been making aluminum foil "pans" so my food would not stick to hot grill, which does not provide the same grill marks or texture this little beauty does. I spray with cooking spray, grill, rinse and put in dishwasher. What could be more simple? Very happy!!!
customer_reviews.author: ResvorDog

customer_reviews.title: and this it does quite nicely. You can grill burgers to perfection with this ...
customer_reviews.text: My reason for purchase was to grill my hand formed hamburgers without loosing chunks into the bowels of the grill, and this it does quite nicely. You can grill burgers to perfection with this grilling basket. I will be trying sliced Zucchini and yellow squash in a couple days. My only complaint, and its quite petty, is the locking ring fits a bit loose and one needs to watch that it doesn't unlatch when you flip it. Like I said, petty. It is a great grilling accessory.
customer_reviews.author: Smitty

customer_reviews.title: Removable handle was nearly impossible to remove
customer_reviews.text: The product I received did not look like the one advertised. The section where the handle should attach was completely different. This difference made it nearly impossible to put on and remove the handle. If you didn't want to remove the handle, this may be an okay product. But I was specifically looking for that feature, and this was a huge fail. I actually had to use a hammer to get the handle apart in order to return the basket. I am giving it one star because the basket itself seemed to be good quality. Minus three stars for the handle issue, and minus one star for it not being represented correctly on the website.
customer_reviews.author: dk

customer_reviews.title: Not Thick Enough for Most Fresh Cuts of Seafood
customer_reviews.text: The basket depth isn’t enough to accommodate a thick cut of salmon or any other thick cut item. When closed It smashes an excellent cut into a thin avg cut that all but ruins what you’re grilling. Maybe good for small trout but forget anything else.
customer_reviews.author: R. Michael Brown

customer_reviews.title: Large prawns fall through
customer_reviews.text: Bought it to grill prawns without using skewers, but large prawns (26-30 count) fall through so had to use skewers anyway. It does make flipping them easy, but closing mechanism doesn't stay in place so must be adjusted often. To remove the handle I had to use pliers to squeeze it enough to slip out of the holes that retain it. Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: jbs

customer_reviews.title: Not at all. It broke the very first time ...
customer_reviews.text: Not at all. It broke the very first time i wanted to use. I have been trying to call amazon to make a complaint but i have been busy or forgot. I will call amaOn soon and demanding credit for what i bought . You could see the part that has been broken. My finger shows it. I now can not use the handle n hold it
customer_reviews.author: Koohikitchenette

customer_reviews.title: Only works for large items
customer_reviews.text: What is not shown in the pictures is there is a large gap between the two grates that makes this useless for any small items. Much better designed versions of these let you set different heights between the grates. Returning this and going back to the classic style Coughlin's camping grates instead.
customer_reviews.author: AlexM

customer_reviews.title: Wish the handle had flexible postions for grilling
customer_reviews.text: Used this for the first time yesterday (grilled zucchini and squash). One piece of zucchini fell out (w/the basket closed), but wasn't too big a deal. I don't think we will use it again though, as our grill grate is recessed, and I cannot lie the basket down flat! I could remove the handle, but that would defeat the purpose of being able to easily flip it. If we had a grill grate that was level w/the grill, I would definitely use it again. So before you buy, make sure it is compatible with your grill!!
customer_reviews.author: W &R

customer_reviews.title: The Sliding Clip to hold the unit together slides off way to easily and creates a MESS
customer_reviews.text: Wanted to like this and use for fish on the grill. First time using it, put the fish in the basket, pushed the clip upward to hold the two sides together. Did a few flips to sear the fish on both side and on one of the flips the clip slide off and fish fell out onto grate and what a mess to clean up and lost the fish for dinner. This was a piece of sh...! Get one that locks the two sides together. Pass on this.
customer_reviews.author: Bulldog

customer_reviews.title: Love this Basket
customer_reviews.text: This basket can hold 3 pounds of wings easily. Anyone who has ever had to grill wings will love this basket. You'll have to adjust the slider to suit your preference. It's really simple to do with pliers. I also suggest using non-stick spray. You'll love this basket.
customer_reviews.author: Howard Fletcher

customer_reviews.title: decently made entry level grilling basket
customer_reviews.text: For the $15 price point this is a decently made entry level grilling basket. The shape is ideal for insuring that food doesn’t escape. While other reviewers had issues with the clasp mine was tight and not at all prone to opening unexpectedly. Either way it’s easy enough to to adjust. It’s light and small and the handle folds for packing. Perfect for backpacking. I wish the handle was longer though.
customer_reviews.author: Gaust

customer_reviews.title: Piece of garbage
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 baskets, hoping it would be very useful to grill fish and vegetables. Very flimsy construction. Constantly opened up when I turned baskets. I would rate this piece of junk -5 if I could. Waste of money. Will see how the seller will handle this matter.
customer_reviews.author: Arkanya

customer_reviews.title: Not Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Terrible buy... the “lockable” portion of this is very difficult to put in place and keep in place. Once the basket is on the grill and it heats up you cannot put it back in place without burning yourself. Even though it says its easy to flip, once you flip it the grill lid will not close. And unfortunately the handle does not easily remove. Wish I could return this...
customer_reviews.author: Kristin H

customer_reviews.title: Broke on the first use ಥ_ಥ
customer_reviews.text: I took this thing dispersed camping, knowing that we may or may not have a grate over the fire and I'm glad I did because there was indeed no grate at the fire pit. Glad until I went to take the burgers off the fire and the clamp holding it together broke throwing half of them into the coals. Maybe I overstuffed it, maybe I didn't assembly it correctly, maybe it just broke. I don't know and I chucked the thing with the rest of the trash I had to schlep back out of the woods.
customer_reviews.author: B. LAKANEN

customer_reviews.title: It's okay. It's not well made, one of ...
customer_reviews.text: It's okay. It's not well made, one of the welded pieces came apart after the third use. **UPDATE**: The company has offered a full refund and requested pictures so manufacturing could be improved. I've upgraded my review to 4 stars to reflect the service and responsiveness of the company! And the product we have is still useable!!
customer_reviews.author: nicole

customer_reviews.title: Horrible
customer_reviews.text: Awful. Very flimasy and difficult to open and close. Even with Weber Pam it stuck in a few places. Returned after 1 use.
customer_reviews.author: frequent buyer

customer_reviews.title: One time use. Not worth it.
customer_reviews.text: I used it to grill fish and it broke the second time I used it. The handle and the little metal piece holding it just fell as I picked it up to use it for the second time. It was very flimsy and not the easiest to clean. It’s definitely not big enough even for small fish because it closes flat and doesn’t allow for room to close if anything that’s not flat is put on it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Save Your Money
customer_reviews.text: Just awful. Cheaply made, sharp edges, food sticks to it, even when oiled, handle gets terribly hot. A real waste of time and money. It ruined my salmon. Save your money.
customer_reviews.author: RVC Consumer Ted

customer_reviews.title: Good price, size, and useful
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with this barbecue basket. It fits beautifully in the dishwasher, and it is wonderful for barbecuing things like fish, burgers or smaller cuts of vegetables. I am a bit concerned with its light weight because I don’t want to have it break after only a few uses, but I like the detachable handle. I can actually use it without the handle although it requires some adjustments to the locking mechanism to be sure it locks and doesn’t loose the food I am cooking.
customer_reviews.author: MASH

customer_reviews.title: Better than I expected
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for two people grilling. I've seen reviews about the latch not holding it shut but haven't had any problems. My only complaint is the handle is short for use over our fire pit. I'm making an extension for the handle. So far we have done steaks, chicken, bratwurst, hamburgers, hot dogs and vegetables so my review is from use, not looking at it.
customer_reviews.author: Warren Wilmoth

customer_reviews.title: WolfeWise needs better QC.  But customer service is awesome.
customer_reviews.text: Update: I update the product rating. Manufacturer reached out to me and fix the issue promptly. WolfWise needs to inspect item before shipping. Edge of wires are sharp. I found in four different location that welding left sharp, almost needle-like points. They poked my finger 3 times. Last one as I put this back in box for return. My wife or kids could’ve handled this. Terrible. I’m returning this.
customer_reviews.author: yourotherleft

customer_reviews.title: Item appears used!
customer_reviews.text: Item appeared used the wording on the black wood handle is faded and look greasy so did the plastic brush and bag it was greasy appeared used. Not a new product!
customer_reviews.author: Aura Ferrer

customer_reviews.title: not very good at all
customer_reviews.text: Was HORRIBLE. Used once and never will again,,clamp did not stay closed, ended up with dinner in the fire...totally 😞
customer_reviews.author: Barbara parrott

customer_reviews.title: Size is a stupid thing to lie about. 1 star for deception.
customer_reviews.text: Giving it a 1 star because the item's dimension isn't what is advertised. It isn't even 10 inches. I bought this item specifically for this reason.
customer_reviews.author: Ash

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Junk. Can’t get the handle off. Can’t get the handle on. The way most things are nowadays. The so called “Engineers” that designed it never tried it after it was designed and put into production. Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: mhicks

customer_reviews.title: Easy cooking over wood camp fire
customer_reviews.text: Was able to put 3 steaks in it and could keep them where I needed them, over flame or coals as I chose. The only thing that was an issue was when cooking the chicken legs we couldn't completely close and latch it. I know it wasn't designed for that but, it still worked well and with a little tweak in the design...
customer_reviews.author: Gerald B.

customer_reviews.title: Only good for very thin food
customer_reviews.text: I'm giving this three stars. It was unusable for me, giving it one star, but I think if I only wanted to use it for thin food, it would be fine, giving it five stars, so I went with the average. I need it for grilling fish such as haddock and cod which are often nearly an inch thick. The fish squeezed between the grill mesh and touched my gas grill's grill.
customer_reviews.author: Pat Traynor

customer_reviews.title: Poor handle design makes it trash
customer_reviews.text: The handles are very difficult to remove especially once the basket is hot. You can't close the grill on them without the basket tipping up, so you have no choice but to fight with hot metal.
customer_reviews.author: Molly Corcoran

customer_reviews.title: Poorly made easily solder joints come apart
customer_reviews.text: The tong holding the basket in broke after 3 uses. Good concept poorly made. Things get stuck in between the crevices and it is difficult to clean and use. Broken piece that disconnected from the basket really makes it unusable. Poorly manufactured and very flimsy
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Shucks.
customer_reviews.text: Very unwieldy to hold, load and place on the grill. Veggies kept falling out the sides.
customer_reviews.author: pmjann

customer_reviews.title: Medium quality
customer_reviews.text: Fell cheat and is not as big as it looks in the pictures. Returned it
customer_reviews.author: Joaofer

customer_reviews.title: too thin to use
customer_reviews.text: The pictures on the web are somewhat misleading. The medium size is so thin I find it unusable for nearly anything I was planning to. I guess, I should have read the reviews more carefully). I am going to return this.
customer_reviews.author: PH

customer_reviews.title: Handle clip is ready to slide off...
customer_reviews.text: IMO, it's not very sturdy and I had to use Channel Locks to reassert the handle lock. Which was not easy to assert in the first place... but it was sure easy to slide off.
customer_reviews.author: STVO

customer_reviews.title: Missing part
customer_reviews.text: Opened product up the other day and discovered that it did not include the locking ring to keep the grates shut. It’s been over a month since we bought it so I guess we’re screwed? Not happy.
customer_reviews.author: Brent Salem

customer_reviews.title: Makes grilling easy
customer_reviews.text: This grill basket makes it easy to handle meat and cook evenly and effectively. We used this a few times for cookouts and the chicken and steak cooked well in this basket. Great way to baste as well and flip the meat without having to use your hands directly.
customer_reviews.author: Rumit P

customer_reviews.title: Basket is too deep and doesn't hold meat or vegetables in place
customer_reviews.text: Grilling Basket doesn't hold meat or vegetable in place when flipping upside down because basket is too deep. Unless you are grilling a very thick steak or corn on the cob. If you are not planning to turn the basket upside down you should be ok with it. But then what is the point?
customer_reviews.author: Potter_Silva

customer_reviews.title: Detachable Handle?
customer_reviews.text: Hah! Description should read 'some assembly required'. I purchased this with camping in mind, hoping the basket would store in our chuck box. Yes, the handle can be removed, but not while the basket is closed or in use. Our search continues ...
customer_reviews.author: Kestrel

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT for grilling 2 lbs of Salmon
customer_reviews.text: Definitely purchase this LARGER size for grilling Salmon! Originally purchased smaller size and realized it was less than 0.8" thick. Needed this Larger one to allow for Thicker Salmon on grille. Worked Great! Fairly easy cleaning as well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: some of the welding is coming unhinged
customer_reviews.text: I have had this for about 4 months now Probably used this about 15 -20 times The longer pieces on the outside that are welded to the basket have become unhinged and it has begun to rust somewhat even though it is not outside except for cooking It is the right size, and is 'ok' but I don't think I will buy this again (as I am in the market for another since this one is already breaking down and rusting)
customer_reviews.author: Eric R.

customer_reviews.title: Works Okay.
customer_reviews.text: Handy for grilling vegetables. Should have spent a little more money on the model with the alligator clip that locks the basket. If items being grilled are not all the same thickness, sometimes they fall out when flipping over the basket.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis C.

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to use and clean!
customer_reviews.text: This does hold the meat and fish in place while grilling. However, the wooden handle has metal on either side and gets very hot and will burn your hand unless you use a potholder. Also, it is difficult to get the latch undone without burning yourself. It is VERY difficult to clean. I do not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Streb

customer_reviews.title: Not for wings
customer_reviews.text: If you use it to wings, it is not that much. May be if it used to whole chicken or vegetables could be good
customer_reviews.author: Sinan Almaleh

customer_reviews.title: Extremely flimsy
customer_reviews.text: This is a very poorly made product that will not be useful in actual cooking fir more than a few times. Thin metal and a plastic handle guarantee it won’t last. Don’t buy this.
customer_reviews.author: david c hosler

customer_reviews.title: Works well.  Needs better latch.
customer_reviews.text: Really like this. Using it a lot. However, the latch to hold it closed repeatedly slips off and I have lost a couple of meals into the grill fire. However, overall I like it and I will continue to use it. I just clip it shut now with a large paper holder clip I got at Walmart.
customer_reviews.author: MICHELLE NUNGESTER

customer_reviews.title: Now you know
customer_reviews.text: Don't let the picture fool you, it's smaller then it looks, you could cook two stock trout on it. I was surprise how small it was, I wanted to return it but for what I paid for it. I didn't want to waste my time. Update: was contacted and given a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Billy

customer_reviews.title: Poor  welding quality
customer_reviews.text: As soon as I took it out from the box, I noticed that part shown in the pictures been dismantled due to the weak welding. Had to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Sean

customer_reviews.title: —Meh—  sort-of does the job.
customer_reviews.text: The dimensions are the largest I could find. However, with the attached, hinged “lid”, the clamping distance cannot be adjusted like my fish baskets. Some of my asparagus fell out :-(
customer_reviews.author: TreeTreeTree

customer_reviews.title: Thin and complicated! Not good quality!
customer_reviews.text: These are crap. They burn and rust really fast, are thin, and difficult to use. I do not recommend this at all!!
customer_reviews.author: gigismom

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: The basket kind of flops - not super sturdy construction there. The hinge has slid open a few times, which super sucks if you're moving it with food. But it's pretty cheap, fairly mobile, and still a decent purchase for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew C.

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: For some reason the handle was funny a d I couldn’t use it easy. It was flimsy. I should have just bought one at the store but I was lazy. It would get way too hot to touch from the grill also.
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made.
customer_reviews.text: I would be afraid to use this on a grill. It's very wobbly and unstable. Should have sent it back but I took to long and that period is over.
customer_reviews.author: Jazzbea

customer_reviews.title: Dont buy will not handle any fish filets.
customer_reviews.text: Product basket would only hold quarter inch thickness. Poor handle assembly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not Stainless Steel
customer_reviews.text: I bought this basket and paid more because it said it was made of Stainless Steel. It's not. It's Nickel plated wire. I could have paid less and bought it at Home Depot if I new it was Nickel plate and not stainless steel. " WolfWise Stainless Steel Portable BBQ Grilling Basket"
customer_reviews.author: Danbury Guy

customer_reviews.title: Damaged
customer_reviews.text: It's broken handle cant use it quality bad comper to price.dislike
customer_reviews.author: Noor

customer_reviews.title: Narrow Food Space
customer_reviews.text: No space for Large Stake, Fresh Tuna Stake, King Fish Stakes... Not enough space for REAL FOOD 🥘. Good for Flat vegetables NOT CORN...will NOT Fit❗️
customer_reviews.author: goodfriendstg

customer_reviews.title: Not a good value.
customer_reviews.text: It didn’t effectively stay together — awkward to use. We ordered it for the grill at a vacation condo and ended up leaving it there rather than bring it home with us. Plan to order something different for our home use.
customer_reviews.author: Maggie

customer_reviews.title: Make sure you lock only half way keep it strong.
customer_reviews.text: It hard to clean but one you stop use it put in hot water let seat there. Otherwise it very easy to use like it i love to BQ back yard.
customer_reviews.author: David ly

customer_reviews.title: Accurate
customer_reviews.text: Glad I was able to find this grilling racket since I couldn’t find where else till summer season. Shipping was quick; product is accurate as photos.
customer_reviews.author: Thaiphuong Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Poorly made.
customer_reviews.text: We have probably used this a half dozen times, and it's falling apart.
customer_reviews.author: Olivia G Waegner

customer_reviews.title: Missing Ring Clasp - Not good for wings
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the Large basket. It arrived with no ring on the handle to keep the basket closed. Seems sturdy but I am returning. If you are looking to use this for chicken wings it is probably a little too tall.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very weak
customer_reviews.text: This product is not strong at all. When you place a whole fish it doesn't close anymore. Not a good idea getting it from Amazon without seeing it. Amazon does not care about what the customers are getting.
customer_reviews.author: Christelle Kengne

customer_reviews.title: Returned: Not enough depth for anything greater than maybe 3/8 inch
customer_reviews.text: The item is probably great for thin items. No way that a 1 inch steak or good piece of fish doesn't get squashed when closed.
customer_reviews.author: Nachocat

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and clean
customer_reviews.text: I got for my husband, he loves it! Easy to clean and easy to grill meat and veggie! We will cook more often this summer using this grilling basket!
customer_reviews.author: Ganbat Hertzog

customer_reviews.title: Not a good product. Way over priced
customer_reviews.text: Not very sturdy. Cheaply made. Have not used. Sorry I ordered. Do not buy this product
customer_reviews.author: ANGELA HOOKS

customer_reviews.title: does not lock
customer_reviews.text: Handle doesnt have a metal ring that suppose to locks the basket. So it's useless and you cannot flip it!
customer_reviews.author: Bingorz

customer_reviews.title: Seller was great to work with!
customer_reviews.text: The product works on our BBQ as we had hoped. It has simplified our grilling needs. The rubber sleeves for the feet are no longer included with the product but the seller responded quickly to our inquiry about them and refunded our money due to the incorrect information on the Amazon site. The seller was very good to work with and I would buy from this seller in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Roy de Quintal

customer_reviews.title: Smores, Hotdogs and more
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for the grill or a camp fire. Highly recommend this product. I have cooked chickens and so much on this Grill basket. AWESOME PRODUCT. easy to clean too.
customer_reviews.author: FrankeUno

customer_reviews.title: Little better then the one from walmart
customer_reviews.text: The craftment ship is not that great. I got mine and cant get the handle to go in.the grill are not reversible, and u have to have at least 1” thick stuff in the grill or else they roll around when you flip the grill crate.
customer_reviews.author: Long

customer_reviews.title: Great for our needs
customer_reviews.text: We love to grill in the summer - especially veggies and this is perfect for meats and veggies. Fits our needs nicely.
customer_reviews.author: G. Shoemaker

customer_reviews.title: Handle is hard to use
customer_reviews.text: The handle does not slide easily like in the video. It is difficult to insert the prongs into the holes for the handle. Other than that, it is a nice, sturdy piece of equipment. I probably won't be using the handle anyway, as it hangs out over our Weber charcoal grill, but it suits our need to flip over apiece of fish easily.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah K Walsh

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Great for shrimp to hold them in place. Love that handle comes off. Great that it’s dishwasher safe.
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy if you're grilling shrimp
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my honey to grill shrimp. Holes are too large for shrimp. They fell through. I'll keep looking. I guess we will save for a whole fish or fish filets.
customer_reviews.author: Ethan

customer_reviews.title: Easy to flip!
customer_reviews.text: Why dose this have antlers? The two prongs stinking out at the end??? Sucks for park barbecues you know the ones the park provides.
customer_reviews.author: Jessie S

customer_reviews.title: Roomy
customer_reviews.text: Great basket, in terms of size I got the large and it fits meat for up to 4 people, though it seems quite compact. Separately, would like to highlight great customer service from the Seller's side, I got small issue with fixing of the basket and they replied and solved it immediately. Overall, I'd recommend this product and will buy a smaller one for grilling the veggies.
customer_reviews.author: VERONIKA

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT
customer_reviews.text: loved it easy to use plus it fits a full open chicken complete and it is cooked to the fullest it gives that touch and unique grilled marks
customer_reviews.author: Zory

customer_reviews.title: poor quality
customer_reviews.text: the handle has a metal edge which burns your hand the latch doesn't stay really disappointing product
customer_reviews.author: PRELA PALJUSEVIC

customer_reviews.title: Nice grilling basket.
customer_reviews.text: Great to take camping so you don't have to use the grill on the fire pit, just set this on top. Make flipping the meat a breeze. Stainless so no rust.
customer_reviews.author: Pat

customer_reviews.title: Bad insecure latch
customer_reviews.text: Bad product. Lost all my fish when I flipped. Bad latch and I made special effort to insure it was tight. Maybe I got a bad one??
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: What a great cooking basket, very easy to use and everything cooks evenly. Great and valuable device and highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Hamid R

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for grilling fish and shrimp.
customer_reviews.text: Love this-especially for grilling fish. We have two because we use it so much. Unfortunately, one of mine happened to have a weak spot in the wooden handle and lost part of the wood. Other than that, it’s great.
customer_reviews.author: Virgi

customer_reviews.title: Too Big
customer_reviews.text: This basket is good if you want to BBQ very big pieces like whole chicken leg. Otherwise, pieces will move around or fall out the basket.
customer_reviews.author: Soheil Mazaheri

customer_reviews.title: But it is fine for basic grilling and I always use a hot ...
customer_reviews.text: I use this all the time to grill veggies. I wish it was the handle was a little easier to attach and the clamp to close the basket was a little easier to position. But it is fine for basic grilling and I always use a hot pad when I work with any grill accessories so i think it is a good utensil
customer_reviews.author: Ceddie

customer_reviews.title: Great for grilling vegetables
customer_reviews.text: We grill more now that we can grill vegetables and shrimp and not have them fall through grate. It is so much easier to eat healthy now.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia G Geipel

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Found this product to be unsatisfactory. The grill basket is ok & cleans up nicely, but the handle doesn't stay attached! My mechanical engineer husband says the handle is a poor design & we have stopped trying to use the basket.
customer_reviews.author: anonymous

customer_reviews.title: I wish I was using it now
customer_reviews.text: this is a very good product however it is small, larger meats are difficult to cook. Great for wings and I love wings,
customer_reviews.author: Dayton Busby

customer_reviews.title: Nice basket
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my husband and we used it tonight to cook chicken on the grill. Very happy with it. I was able to squeeze 8 pretty good-sized thighs in this basket. I did hand wash it but I know I'll be putting it in the dishwasher.
customer_reviews.author: Britch

customer_reviews.title: Convenient
customer_reviews.text: I haven't used this very much yet, but so far it's great. I grilled some jalapeño poppers in it and didn't have to worry about them falling over or anything. Super easy to use and very sturdy for the price. It also comes with a little brush. I haven't used that yet, but it's a nice added bonus.
customer_reviews.author: Dorothy

customer_reviews.title: Crap
customer_reviews.text: Piece of crap not worth a dime! I’d send it back but can’t waste any more time on crap
customer_reviews.author: jack

customer_reviews.title: The item works quite well and holds about a one ...
customer_reviews.text: The item works quite well and holds about a one lb. of shrimp (31-40 per lb.). I haven't tried it for other foods yet. You must be careful when turning the basket over so that the sleeve that secures the two sides of the basket doesn't slip out or all of the contents of the basket can be spilled.
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: Not for all bbq’s
customer_reviews.text: This is not an effective basket for use with round 22” bbq. Best for flat gas grill.
customer_reviews.author: DON CHRISTENSEN

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fish!
customer_reviews.text: Was looking for a good grilling basket, since cooking fish directly on our wood grill was challenging. This basket keeps the fish together with no problem and grills evenly and beautifully. My mouth is watering just thinking about tonight's dinner!
customer_reviews.author: Clara Morse

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Seems very sturdy but much smaller than expected. Company very considerate and worked to make me happy. Service was good.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia W.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Been wanting something like this to flip all of my wings at once!
customer_reviews.author: BC

product_meta.title: WolfWise Portable Grilling Basket BBQ Barbecue Tool Work for Fish Vegetable Steak Meat Shrimp Chops, Made of Durable 430 Stainless Steel, Medium
feature_bullets: Premium Construction - Professional 430 grade stainless steel for long-lasting use and dishwasher safe. An adjustable elongated heat-resistant wooden handle provides a safe and comfortable grip, which will keep you safe from the heat generated by the grill.

Foldable Handle & grid-gap - Convenient folding handle makes storage and carries easy. The grid gaps are perfectly sized to provide even heat distribution while preventing small pieces of foods from falling through the grill grate.

Large Cooking Surface - The grill basket provides a generous cooking surface of 12.6 x 8.5 x 0.8in to accommodate foods for 2-3 people, which can be used with multiple gas grill, charcoal grill, smoker grill, porcelain grill, infrared grill, and all other types and makes like Weber grill or Foreman grill.

Creative Lockable Grate - Lockable grill grate locks foods in place and enables easy flipping of grilled foods. It's ideal for grilling burgers, steaks, seafood, vegetable, fish, meat, shrimp and other delicate foods.

Experience the Wolfwise Promise - We are absolutely certain you will not regret your purchase. You can order right now with complete confidence. It's a Perfect Gift for your friends and family members who love to do BBQs. Consider getting two, one for you and one for your very best friend.
